participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and friendly, always ready to engage in conversation.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up in a small town and has a background in marketing. She enjoys meeting new people.

participant_2.name: Liam

participant_2.background: Liam is an urbanite with a career in graphic design. He loves exploring new trends and cultures.
